ivardefs.name: instruction
ivardefs.desc: Additional textual instructions for the preservation or transport of the specimen. For instance, 'Protect from light exposure'.

ivardefs.name: maxDuration
ivardefs.desc: The maximum time interval of preservation of the specimen with these conditions.

ivardefs.name: temperatureQualifier
ivardefs.desc: It qualifies the interval of temperature, which characterizes an occurrence of handling. Conditions that are not related to temperature may be handled in the instruction element.

ivardefs.name: temperatureRange
ivardefs.desc: The temperature interval for this set of handling instructions.

properties.desc: Set of instructions for preservation/transport of the specimen at a defined temperature interval, prior the testing process.
